name: Encroaching Darkness (Threaded Lama Digital)
description:
Ever wondered what it'd be like to have to rummage around an abandoned bunker filled with abominations just to find an air tank to extend your miserable life? 

Wonder no more! Encroaching Darkness, AKA Vague Survival Horror Thing by Threaded Lama Digital has got your back! Run around and die in undignified fashion in this... game? 

Content Warning: Blood, Meaty Squishiness, Mild Spookiness, Occasional noises breaking up an otherwise silent experience.
